## Events namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockBase](./blockly.events.blockbase.md) | Abstract class for a block event. |
|  [BlockChange](./blockly.events.blockchange.md) | Class for a block change event. |
|  [BlockCreate](./blockly.events.blockcreate.md) | Class for a block creation event. |
|  [BlockDelete](./blockly.events.blockdelete.md) | Class for a block deletion event. |
|  [BlockDrag](./blockly.events.blockdrag.md) | Class for a block drag event. |
|  [BlockMove](./blockly.events.blockmove.md) | Class for a block move event. Created before the move. |
|  [BubbleOpen](./blockly.events.bubbleopen.md) | Class for a bubble open event. |
|  [Click](./blockly.events.click.md) | Class for a click event. |
|  [CommentBase](./blockly.events.commentbase.md) | Abstract class for a comment event. |
|  [CommentChange](./blockly.events.commentchange.md) | Class for a comment change event. |
|  [CommentCreate](./blockly.events.commentcreate.md) | Class for a comment creation event. |
|  [CommentDelete](./blockly.events.commentdelete.md) | Class for a comment deletion event. |
|  [CommentMove](./blockly.events.commentmove.md) | Class for a comment move event. Created before the move. |
|  [FinishedLoading](./blockly.events.finishedloading.md) | Class for a finished loading event. Used to notify the developer when the workspace has finished loading (i.e domToWorkspace). Finished loading events do not record undo or redo. |
|  [MarkerMove](./blockly.events.markermove.md) | Class for a marker move event. |
|  [Selected](./blockly.events.selected.md) | Class for a selected event. |
|  [ThemeChange](./blockly.events.themechange.md) | Class for a theme change event. |
|  [ToolboxItemSelect](./blockly.events.toolboxitemselect.md) | Class for a toolbox item select event. |
|  [TrashcanOpen](./blockly.events.trashcanopen.md) | Class for a trashcan open event. |
|  [Ui](./blockly.events.ui.md) | Class for a UI event. |
|  [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md) | Base class for a UI event. UI events are events that don't need to be sent over the wire for multi-user editing to work (e.g. scrolling the workspace, zooming, opening toolbox categories). UI events do not undo or redo. |
|  [VarBase](./blockly.events.varbase.md) | Abstract class for a variable event. |
|  [VarCreate](./blockly.events.varcreate.md) | Class for a variable creation event. |
|  [VarDelete](./blockly.events.vardelete.md) | Class for a variable deletion event. |
|  [VarRename](./blockly.events.varrename.md) | Class for a variable rename event. |
|  [ViewportChange](./blockly.events.viewportchange.md) | Class for a viewport change event. |
